The presence of boom poles and larger: than-anticipated boom microphones held by reporters in the video.
The hand of President Joe Biden appearin: which is a result of the mics being at a different distance than expected.
The testimony of Steve Herman: the reporter holding the fuzzy grey microphone, confirming that he was physically present with the president on the south lawn of the White House during the filming of the video.
The analysis and explanation provided by: a visual effects specialist, illustrating that the claim of a green screen being used is unfounded.
